Computer.name: Test Node
Computer.file: This is a file! You can write whatever you want here.

Data.Block: [@Akamanto] What's this time? [@Skyton] Got someone with the progress on your "overwatch" [@Akamanto] Let me guess, something I'd like to hear? [@Skyton] So, you've needed a way through BitTorrent protocols, right? There's some guys, who make stuff exactly for that. [@Akamanto] Alright, I'm listening. [@Skyton] The guys call themselves "R4-tre", groups new, but the blokes on it are somewhat known, heard of Cr4zy_R3I7? [@Akamanto] That cunt's not dead yet? After everything? Lucky bastard. [@Skyton] Heard Providence's been on a hunt for him recently, so beware. [@Akamanto] I got it, but I need to find his tools. [@Skyton] They do have a website, that's all I have
